long_description: The Thule M.O.A.B basket is built for the outdoor adventurer's lifestyle. Just pack your bags, bikes, boat and the kitchen sink-there's room for everything! M.O.A.B. refers to the Mother Of All Baskets-perfectly sized to fit on 4x4s, SUVs and wagons. Load Bars adjust to allow attachment of bike, ski and watersport carriers. Completely redesigned hub system ensures quick, hassle-free assembly. Easy to install with quick on/off mounting hardware. Custom fairing reduces wind noise while providing a finished look. Weatherproof, smooth black finish. Deter tampering by adding 4 Keyed-Alike Locks, sold separately.
short_description: The Thule M.O.A.B basket is built for the outdoor adventurer's lifestyle. Just pack your bags, bikes, boat and the kitchen sink-there's room for everything!
